reason.title: Why am I going to change job?
firstText: From childhood I was interested in mathematics, and especially geometry. Therefore, I decided that I had a successful future in the world of economics and finance. After graduation, I began to study and continue to work in this area.
Soon, I realized that design of documents and presentations make more sense to me than the content of these documents.
Missing a long period of mental anguish, I will go straight to the main point. About two years ago, I unexpectedly discovered the world of web development.
secondText: Already at the end of May 2019, I finally set priorities and enrolled in full-stack developer courses in GoIT.

After weighing the pros and cons, I decided to change my profession as soon as possible to get a more relevant experience, so I got a job as a junior fron-end developer much earlier before graduation of the GoIT course.
As a result of this decision, I significantly improved my knowledge and skills, however, now I decided to go further to maximize my potential and fully apply the knowledge gained in GoIT course.

tablet: I combine creativity and analytical thinking, ready to learn a lot, focus on results, sociable, attentive to details, punctual, responsible. I have no bad habits.

salary.title: Expected salary
text: On average, the front-end developer in Kiev earns ~$1200. This is the median of wages according to the data of 137 vacancies posted on work.ua site over the past 3 months. Also, according to the djinni portal, the largest number of offers were sent to candidates with the expected salary in the range from $1000+ to $2000+ (Among candidates with work experience from 1 to 2 years)

Regarding the DOU portal, the range was from $1000 to $1600 for developers with knowledge of the javascript programming language, but this is information for June 2020, which is a less relevant indicator.
salary.sale: In connection with the current situation in the world, I am ready to make a special offer for you. If you contact me in the near future, you will receive a discount of $200.01
salary.graphText: Still in doubt? Then the abstruse charts presented below should remove all your doubts
salary.captionOne: In this graph, the blue line shows the effectiveness of my work compared to other candidates who also want to get to your company. In my opinion, the choice is obvious.
salary.captionTwo: If you are not convinced by the first schedule, then see how your company's revenue will increase after I get to work for you.
salary.endText: I hope this page amused you a little. In the worst case, no. Well, seriously, my expected income level is $1.4K, but in any case write to me, we can discuss it.
